home.text_base_description: If you have been searching for the quintessential all American Home this is the property for you! Welcome to 3769 Oliver Street NW, an absolutely stunning, full-scale renovation of a charming 1912 farmhouse with wrap-around porch offering nearly 5000 SF of living space across four expansive levels and situated on a flat lot. 6 Bedrooms 4.5 bathrooms. SEE VIDEO https://www. youtube.com/watch?v=gbrVrDWvbSw & t=20s A grand home with a new, contemporary floor-plan well-suited for the most discerning buyers. No expense was spared in this complete renovation. Stepping inside, you are immediately drawn to the wide-plank, white oak floors laid in a herringbone pattern bathed in natural light from the many windows on all sides. The open-inspired floor plan across the main level allows for flexible living and dining room spaces graciously centered by a magnificent dual-sided gas fireplace. The kitchen is a chef's dream with custom two-tone cabinets, a delightful porcelain farm sink and additional vegetable sink, Viking appliances and a magnificent two-tiered island with stunning quartz counters and backsplash. Upstairs, the second level boasts an expansive owner's suite complete with striking en-suite bath with dual vanity, walk-in shower and free-standing designer bathtub, together with a large walk-in closet. Two additional large bedrooms share a charming jack-and-jill bathroom with tub and a separate laundry room with sink and ample storage complete this main bedroom level. Continuing to the third level, two additional generous-sized bedrooms (perfect for that home office and/or home fitness studio) and a large open space perfect for a home theater and/or multi-purpose family room are complimented by a full bathroom with standing shower. The attached lower level enjoys a consistent level of finish and design with an additional kitchen with island, full bathroom, separate laundry and large, light-filled bedroom - a perfect in-law/ live-in au pair suite or bonus flexible living space! No details have been overlooked the mud room located at the home's rear entrance, one car garage and a huge backyard with rear deck simply add to the long list of features that make this the perfect home for anyone! Additional features include dual zone heating and cooling, gas appliances, and energy star rated systems. The location could not be any better! Located just steps away from coffeeshops, restaurants, grocery stores and specialty shops. Walk score of 87! Living here combines the best of the city and suburban lifestyles!
